I. 3. 73</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} To argue out, refute, contradict; अपवदेयुस्तानितिहासैः पुरातनैः <ls>Y. 3. 7.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To blame, censure. {@--2@} To oppose or contradict as unadvisable.
